name: Issara Platforms Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of hiring and compliance platform intended to make the employee migration process more efficient, and transparent. The company's platform utilizes a cloud-based workforce management and employment model that automates legal compliance for immigration and employment, enabling businesses to hire international staff and streamline the migration process.
